abstract: United Nations Security Council imposes arms embargo on Houthi fighters in Yemen.
lead_paragraph: The legally binding resolution, which comes after weeks of talks, names three Houthi leaders and the former president, Ali Abdullah Saleh, and his son.

headline.main: U.N. Security Council Bans Sales of Arms to Houthi Fighters in Yemen
headline.print_headline: U.N. Bans Sales of Arms to Houthis in Yemen

snippet: The legally binding resolution, which comes after weeks of talks, names three Houthi leaders and the former president, Ali Abdullah Saleh, and his son.
